Let L
a denote the number of actively enrolled cases of LRTI and C a denote the number of actively enrolled CAP cases with chest X-ray confirmation. Let C
d denote the number of cases with ICD-10 coded pneumonia in the hospital database. Amongst C
d there were some cases which had been missed by the active enrolment and hence no chest X-ray was available to determine whether they attributed to the total incidence of CAP. Among those cases which were included in both L
a and C
d ( L

d ) we determined the proportion ( r), with respect to age group ( i) and gender ( j), which holds those cases with positive chest X-rays ( C
